Package com.company

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
com.company.Triangle
public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
This class hold the triangle details. There are some methods for calculation and drawing.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Triangle​(double firstSide, double secondSide, double thirdSide)
    Create a new Triangle with a given sides.
